choices.answer: A worldwide game-based blended learning platform
A fun classroom engagement tool
A place to share thought provoking questions
An audience response system

questions.question: How can I join the Kahoot! community?

choices.answer: Go to kahoot.com
Follow a few simple and quick steps
Skype interview with the CEO
Get a FREE account

questions.question: Yes I'm a Kahooter now! How do I start creating my first kahoot?

choices.answer: Choose a type of kahoot
With butter and sugar
Get inspiration from the public kahoots
Pick a good title, description, and audience

questions.question: How can I personalize my kahoot?

choices.answer: Upload an image, or add a Youtube video
Change question time limits
Award points or not (Quiz/Jumble only)
Paint the screen
Change its haircut
Drag questions to reorder them
add more questions
edit, duplicate, or trash questions

questions.question: To play a kahoot, I must...

choices.answer: Launch it on a large screen for everyone to see my questions
Join on separate devices with my assigned game pin
Use any web enabled device (mobile, tablet, netbook, laptop)
Join at kahoot.it, or the Kahoot! iOS/Android mobile app
Students & teachers in schools and universities
Friends and family
Social event coordinators
Trainers or business leaders

questions.question: What can I use the results for?

choices.answer: See a full leaderboard & responses to each question
Assigning grades
Informing & adjusting lesson plans
Review feedback/ratings & explore ways to enhance learning
It captivates & focuses a whole room
Students can take control of their own learning
It enables formative assessment & adaptive learning
A fun, easy-to-use and empowering experience

questions.question: Now that I'm in love with Kahoot!, what should I do?

choices.answer: Follow at facebook.com/getkahoot & Twitter @GetKahoot
Download the iOS or Android mobile app
Tell my friends, family, and colleagues
Become an expert at kahoot.com/help and kahoot.com/blog
